content:
That's a wonderful attitude! Focusing on the positives can make a big difference in adjusting to a new living situation.

It's great that you're finding the silver lining and making the most of your new apartment. Having more time for personal projects and reading is a fantastic way to cultivate personal growth, relaxation, and enjoyment.

Remember to be kind to yourself as you continue to settle into your new space. It's normal to feel a little lonely or disconnected at first, but by focusing on the positives and taking proactive steps to meet new people (like taking a language class!), you're already making progress.

Keep in mind that it's okay to take things one step at a time and to prioritize your own needs and interests. You got this!

What kind of personal projects have you been working on, if you don't mind me asking? And what kind of books have you been enjoying lately?
